title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon #4 - Revised & Expanded
description: Has Li Mu Bai finally met defeat by the mighty Shaolin adept - Golden Spear Cheung? It certainly looks that way. But like Li has said in the past; "Never underestimate the power of Tai Chi Sword style!" This particular sword stance is made even more fearsome with the use of the potent Green Destiny sword and ironically, a little help from Golden Spear's own robust chi! Also Jade Fox reveals a potentially crippling revelation regarding Wudan kung fu. It's Shaolin vs. Wudan!
author: Wang Du Lu
